scripts.clean: npm run clean:src && npm run clean:embed
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:src-embed && npm run build:css && webpack
scripts.docs: npm run docs:src && npm run docs:embed
scripts.docs:src: typedoc --mode file --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs/ src
scripts.docs:embed: typedoc --mode file --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs-embed/ src-embed
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:test && webpack --config test/webpack-cov.conf.js && karma start test/karma-cov.conf.js
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:firefox && npm run test:unit:chrome
scripts.test:unit:default: npm run build:test && karma start test/karma.conf.js --log-level debug
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:examples:chrome && npm run test:examples:firefox
scripts.test:example:web2: cd examples/web2 && npm install && npm run test:default
scripts.test:example:web3: cd examples/web3 && npm install && npm run test:default
scripts.test:example:web4: cd examples/web4 && npm install && npm run test:default
scripts.test:example:web5: cd examples/web5 && npm install && npm run test:default
